EmailTemplate.subject: Great to See You at Le Pré-Catelan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Guest}}, It was our very great pleasure to host you at our brunch event at Le Pré-Catelan in Paris on 16th June. We hope you enjoyed this amazing venue. We would like to ensure we can continue to invite you to this, and similar events, in the future and so would ask that you take a moment to register to receive all of the latest news, offers and invitations from us. Registration is quick and easy and can be completed here.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to meeting with you again very soon. Kind regards, The Honeywell Team
